DOC.detailed_description: Eligible patient refractory FCP randomize one 2 arm : active treatment group , receive HHT program ; control group . Patients active treatment group receive 12-week digital audio HHT program . This protocol consist 7 session , approximately 30-40 minute , administer every 2 week , cumulative 12 week treatment , along short ( approximately 12 minute ) session administer daily . Patients control group receive digital audio educational program . Subjects group assess baseline , 4-6 week treatment , end treatment , 3 month conclusion program . Global change symptom assess 7-point Likert scale . Patients consider respond significant improvement Likert scale post-treatment visit . Patients complete chest pain symptom diary , SCL-90 Coping Strategies Questionnaire-Catastrophizing subscale ass psychological feature , SF-36 measure Health Related Quality Life ( HRQOL ) .
